title: RGB Colorspace Atlas, 2011
description: Digital offset print on paper, case bound book, airbrushed cloth cover and page edges  Three books, 8 x 8 x 8 inches each   20.3 x 20.3 x 20.3 cm. Binding co-designed by Daniel E. Kelm and Tauba Auerbach. The books were bound by Daniel E. Kelm assisted by Leah Hughes at the Wide Awake Garage.  Photo: Vegard Kleven
